content: a court in messina issued a final resolution in a case between two parties the judge ordered one party to pay a sum of money and return certain items to the other party the court also dissolved the legal community between the parties and determined the division of property the case originated from a previous judgment of separation where one party was ordered to repay a sum of money the court analyzed the legal framework regarding community property and determined which assets were part of the community property and which were personal property the court also addressed the reimbursement of expenses incurred by one party for the benefit of the family the judge ordered the payment of the specified sum of money and the return of certain items reserving the decision on costs for the final judgment the court of first instance heard the attorneys of the parties involved and disregarded objections or defenses making a final judgment the judgment ordered one party to pay a sum of money with deductions and interest and also ordered the return of certain items it declared the dissolution of the legal community and remanded the case for further proceedings the decision on costs was reserved for a later judgment the judgment was made on march 23 2015 in messina
